transArray.content: This is not the first time I have stayed at a Hanting Hotel. Whenever I go out, I will choose Hanting Hotel because the environment is good, the service is considerate, and there are small robots that can help deliver things. The experience this time is also goodüëç

Dear guest, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel. We will continue to work hard to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel. We look forward to visiting you again. I wish you a pleasant journey.
